Sentencas: The KAMELEON SOFCSIM computer code was developed and used to find simultaneous solutions of all conservation equations for mass, energy and momentum in a quasi three dimensional, single, flat solid oxide fuel cell (height 7.5 mm and length 5.00 cm).
Titulo: A simultaneous solution of all transport processes in a solid oxide fuel

Sentencas: The thickness of the electrolyte and the electrodes was 500 mu m. interconnectors included six transverse ribs through channels for coflow of fuel and air.
Titulo: A simultaneous solution of all transport processes in a solid oxide fuel

Sentencas: A rectangular grid with 2448 points was used for the simulations.
Titulo: A simultaneous solution of all transport processes in a solid oxide fuel

Sentencas: For a given cell voltage, we found that the rib design had a major impact on current production.
Titulo: A simultaneous solution of all transport processes in a solid oxide fuel

Sentencas: An optimum rib size was predicted, A negligible current was calculated in the shadow beneath the ribs.
Titulo: A simultaneous solution of all transport processes in a solid oxide fuel

Sentencas: An optimum gas velocity is expected for a diffusion controlled reaction.
Titulo: A simultaneous solution of all transport processes in a solid oxide fuel

Sentencas: Pressure gradients of about 10(4) Pa m(-1) across the electrolyte may give gas leakage through cracks.
Titulo: A simultaneous solution of all transport processes in a solid oxide fuel

Sentencas: Longitudinal and transverse temperature gradients in the solid materials are such that thermal stresses should be evaluated.

Sentencas: The results for the two-dimensional system are all relevant for three-dimensional stack design.
